newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Girl beats 12,000-1 odds, picks own lottery ticket.
newsitem.headline: Girl beats 12,000-1 odds, picks own lottery ticket.

text.p: A 12-year-old schoolgirl beat odds of 12,000-to-1 by picking her own winning ticket in the lottery of a car, Globo television said on Thursday.
Camila Garcia smiled nervously after fishing the winning ticket out of a pile of 12,000 and discovering her own name on it. "It's mine," she told a startled audience.
The lottery was organised by a local charity in the southern Brazilian city of Curitiba to reward people who had donated clothes and blankets for the poor.
